players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We must vote for Charlie to protect the town."
Charlie: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso."
You: "I think we need more details. Bob, why did you investigate Charlie? Charlie, why Bob?"
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob last night and he is mafioso. Bob is lying to save himself."
You: "Both are accusing each other, but Bob didn't provide more details after my question. That makes me suspicious of Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
